channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S331B08
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 24, 03:30 - 04:30 UTC

Jan 28, 20:01 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect Availability.

Start time : 24/02/2025 03:30 UTC
End time : 24/02/2025 04:30 UTC
Service impact : Public network on rack S331B08 will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101A19/B08/B11/B12
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 12, 07:00 - 10:00 UTC

Jan 23, 16:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified racks.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 12/02/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 12/02/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will migrate servers one by one from racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 to rack E105A08.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Baremetal] - efiBootloaderPath mandatory as input for BringYourOwnImage BringYourOwnLinux
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 5, 11:00 - 11:30 UTC

Jan 7, 15:47 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 05/02/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 05/02/2025 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Starting next month, the EfiBootloaderPath will be required as an input for BringYourOwnImage and BringYourOwnLinux operating systems.
Service improvement : This change will enable customers to customize their EFI bootloader path, if you have any questions or need further clarification, please contact Support.

Follow the links below for the documentation.
BringYourOwnLinux: https://ovh.to/8stqmx3
BringYourOwnImage: https://ovh.to/fRZWyVr

Thank you for your understanding.
